partnerships_and_accreditations.summary: The Department of Computer Applications and Technology at Galgotias University, accredited by NAAC with A+, cultivates partnerships with various Apex and Accreditation Bodies, including the National Council for Teacher Education, Pharmacy Council of India, and the University Grants Commission. These collaborations aim to provide students with advanced opportunities in research, innovation, and experiential learning, with specific programs like CSE, ECE, ME, MBA, and B.Pharm being accredited by NBA. Additional accreditations include those from the Association to Advance Collegiate Schools of Business and the Bar Council of India, reflecting a commitment to high educational standards across multiple disciplines.

student_community_and_innovation.summary: The university fosters a vibrant community through its student council and various groups, encouraging involvement outside the classroom. It champions innovation and entrepreneurship with one of India's largest incubation centers supporting over 100 startups, and provides state-of-the-art tech laboratories for exploring future technologies. Additionally, students can enhance their potential through world-class sports facilities and a diverse range of extracurricular programs.
student_community_and_innovation.raw_content:
Student Council & Groups
Be Part of a Vibrant Community: Our student council and groups offer opportunities to connect, learn, and grow outside of the classroom. Discover how you can get involved today.
Building the Next Big Thing: With 100+ Start-ups, Our incubation center is one of the India’s largest where innovation and entrepreneurship thrive. Join us in creating the future of business, technology, and social impact.
Explore the Future of Tech: Our tech laboratories offer state-of-the-art equipment and expert faculty to guide you in exploring the latest advancements in tech. Start your journey today.
Unleash your potential with world-class sports facilities and diverse extracurricular programs at our leading university.
Embrace the Opportunities of Our Dynamic Sports and Extracurricular Scene
Take your Game to the Next Level with our Top-Notch Sports Infrastructure
